sentences.en: At any hint of a slowdown they shed theshort - timers.
sentences.cn: 一有风吹草动他们就解雇那些 短期 工人.

sentences.en: But the scale of the slowdown has emboldened some.
sentences.cn: 但是经济衰退速度的放缓使一些人跃跃欲试.

sentences.en: But Toyota denied an across - the - board slowdown in vehicle development.
sentences.cn: 但丰田否定了汽车发展一律减速.

sentences.en: He projects a slowdown in the rate of expansion of world trade.
sentences.cn: 他估计世界贸易的发展速度会有所放慢.

sentences.en: Insurance companies are certainly not immune to economic slowdown.
sentences.cn: 保险公司当然无法幸免于经济低迷.

sentences.en: It's impossible to assess how many officers are participating in the slowdown.
sentences.cn: 要估算出究竟多少高级职员参与了怠工是不可能的。

sentences.en: The company's share price was off 5 percent after its slowdown in sales.
sentences.cn: 该公司业绩销售减缓后,其股价下跌百分之五.

sentences.en: The effects of a global economic slowdown would ripple into south - eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 全球经济增长放缓的影响将波及到东南欧洲.

sentences.en: The primary data suggests that there is a slowdown in this market.
sentences.cn: 原始资料表明这个市场出现了下滑.

sentences.en: The slowdown in domestic demand was offset by an increase in exports.
sentences.cn: 国内需求放缓和出口增长互相抵消了.

sentences.en: The sudden economic slowdown was an changer for the election.
sentences.cn: 经济增长突然放缓为选举带来了意想不到的变数.

sentences.en: The union threatened a slowdown if their demands were not met.
sentences.cn: 工会威胁说如果不答应他们的要求,他们就怠工.

sentences.en: There has been a sharp slowdown in economic growth.
sentences.cn: 经济增长的速度明显放慢。

sentences.en: There has been a slowdown in the food trade with you.
sentences.cn: 和你们的食品贸易已有所减少.
